description: Hex Vixen lands quick jab to the face on Nano Experiment

image_prompts.nsfw:
ACTION: Dynamic side-profile shot captures Hex Vixen's quick jab fist slamming into the front of Nano Experiment's face at impact. Hex Vixen snarls fiercely with focused intensity. Nano Experiment's head snaps straight back, eyes wide in shock.

REFERENCE SHEETS: First image is the character sheet for the attacking fighter Hex Vixen, second image is the character sheet for the defending fighter Nano Experiment.

SCENE: Fighting game action shot, skilled brutal combat, visceral physical impact, arena lighting, dark moody atmosphere, full body visible for both fighters.

ART STYLE: Arcane TV series art style, hand-painted textures over detailed 3D forms, extremely detailed skin and fabric textures, painterly brushstroke overlay, rich moody color grading, dramatic volumetric lighting with atmospheric haze, highly detailed anatomy

CONSISTENCY: Exactly two distinct characters, each maintains their exact original design from their reference sheet.

CHARACTER BODIES: Hex Vixen: slender lithe pale athletic build, porcelain skin, long wavy raven-black hair to hips with silver chains, elegant sharp features, piercing emerald green eyes, intricate glowing occult serpent tattoos on arms neck torso thighs. Nano Experiment: sleek cyber-athletic build with toned curves, pale Siberian skin, short platinum blonde hair with blue fiber-optic strands, sharp high cheekbones and full lips, jagged surgical scars on collarbone and temples, faint blue vein networks on arms and torso, steel-blue cybernetic eyes.

CHARACTER CLOTHING: Hex Vixen wears completely naked except thigh-high black leather boots silver serpent buckles, elbow-length black lace thorn gloves, black velvet choker ruby pendant, silver occult rune armbands. Nano Experiment wears completely naked except thigh-high silver boots, choker, gloves, armbands.

description: Nano Experiment lands heavy right hook to the ribs on Hex Vixen
action: heavy right hook to the ribs

image_prompts.nsfw:
ACTION: Nano Experiment's heavy right hook smashes into Hex Vixen's left ribs at impact, his face gritted with savage intensity. Hex Vixen's torso twists sharply inward, body arching sideways in agony as ribs compress. Cinematic low side angle from punch origin, dynamic motion blur on fist.
